headline: ARM Holdings' Valuation Running Ahead of Fundamentals Amid AI Hype
summary: ARM's lofty 85X forward P/E and modest chip royalties raise questions about sustainability amid AI-driven investor hype.

headline: 3 Cheap Tech Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Investors have continued to sell Adobe despite its P/E ratio reaching multi-year lows.  China concerns and the loss of a key client have weighed on chipmaker Qualcomm.  Indeed, that is likely true with many technology companies whose heydays have come and gone.

headline: This Week In AI Chips - Arteris FlexGen Wins AI Engineering Innovation Award
summary: Arteris, Inc. has received the "AI Engineering Innovation Award" at the 2025 AI Breakthrough Awards for its introduction of FlexGen, a smart network-on-chip (NoC) interconnect IP technology. This innovation addresses the complexity of designing AI-centric semiconductors, particularly for data center and automotive applications, by automating key aspects of NoC creation, resulting in enhanced performance and efficiency. FlexGen's automation capabilities have enabled early user designs to...

headline: Silicon Motion's UFS Solution Completes Compatibility Validation with Qualcomm® Snapdragon® Cockpit SA8295P Platform
summary: Silicon Motion Technology Corporation (NasdaqGS: SIMO) ("Silicon Motion"), a global leader in the design and marketing of NAND flash controllers for solid-state storage devices, is pleased to announce that its Universal Flash Storage (UFS) solution has successfully completed compatibility validation on Qualcomm® Snapdragon® Cockpit SA8295P Platform. This achievement enables automotive customers to confidently adopt Silicon Motion's UFS solution with the Snapdragon® Cockpit SA8295P designs.
